title: Complex Power Calculation
description: This function calculates the power of a complex number X raised to another complex number Y using the formula CPOW(X, Y) = CEXP(CMUL(Y, CLOG(X))).
name: CPOW

input.name: X
input.description: The base complex number that is to be raised to a power.

input.name: Y
input.description: The exponent complex number that indicates the power to which X is raised.

output.name: CPOW
output.description: The result of raising the complex number X to the power of the complex number Y.

return_value.description: The calculated complex power result of X raised to Y.
